data.name: Putinist Slayer
data.detailed_description:
Putinist Slayer is a fast-paced action about destroying putinists in deep space. Let loose in infinity roguelike shoot’em up with sticky gameplay. Kill hordes, dodge, upgrade, eliminate bosses and reach new highest records!

Comic interpretation of classic shoot’em up mechanics will allow you to see well-known gameplay from new side. At first sight weird combination of visual styles creates unique vibe what reveal current topics in game format.

Our game can offer you kill famous enemies of democracy оver and over as if recreate your the bravest dreams. Burn them using laser or cocktail Molotov — just the kind of question you would have.

Diversity of character upgrades & powerups which you will collect in battle will allow to build unrepeatable mixes of abilities every time. Infinity progression in rogue-like format constructs unique game situations. It will stick you on long hours !

Bosses are fat by corruption & health size. They will try to stop your angry flow. Several stages with variety of attacks will challenge you to use all willpower and accumulated perks to defend galaxy democracy.

De-stress, justice, eliminate evil and be brave like Ukrainians in our shoot’em up — Putinist Slayer !

With memes from Ukraine.

data.short_description: Putinist Slayer is a fast-paced action about destroying putinists in deep space. Let loose in infinity roguelike shoot’em up with sticky gameplay. Kill hordes, dodge, upgrade, eliminate bosses and reach new highest records! With memes from Ukraine.
data.supported_languages:
English, Russian*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 1.6Ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB+
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 2Ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB+
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse recommended
